entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:55 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of rain mixed with drizzle this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and drizzle changing to a few flurries after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
